definitions.structures.abstr.vectorspaces

Interface InnerProductSpace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Group, MetricSpace, Monoid, NormedSpace, SemiGroup, java.io.Serializable, VectorSpace, XmlPrintable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DiscreetField, EuclideanAlgebra, EuclideanFunctionSpace, EuclideanSpace, Field, FiniteDomain, FiniteField, FinitePrimeField, ParameterizedSpace, PrimeField
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplexPlane, FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace, FiniteDimensionalSobolevSpace, FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace, FunctionalSpace, PolynomialFunctionSpace, QuaternionSpace, RealLine, TrigonometricSobolevSpace, TrigonometricSpace

    public interface InnerProductSpace
extends NormedSpace
    Author:
    RoManski A hilbert space is a normed space where the norm is induced by a scalar product.
